name: CHAKULIA RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY
briefDescription: Our organization established for all round development of the society. Specially S/C, S/T, OBC and Muslim Minority community. It’s situated in very backward place in North Bengal. Our organization “Chakulia Rural Development Society” is a non profitable organization. Working from 2004 at remote are under North Dinajpur District. Government and public representative are happy for Quality Base work  of our organization.
